ace_sentences: I noticed that there are more players of color in sports than managers and head coaches.
I think that there should be more leaders of color than there are now.
I wonder why there are fewer leaders of color than players of color in sports.
This situation shows that any person can play sports regardless of race or gender.
I think that, over time, more people of color can become managers and head coaches.
This graph displays the ratio of players of color to head coaches in different leagues.
I think that the title of this graph should be "The absence of diverse leaders in sports".
